languages.text: {n}Голос Сороритас звучен и горяч. С каждым словом щеки Ардженты пылают все больше от рвения и экзальтации. За этим голосом хочется прорываться сквозь заслоны врагов и минные поля, разя всех, кто посягает на Его славу. Когда гимн заканчивается, вы распалены, словно все это время сражались с Арджентой плечом к плечу.{/n}

{n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Сороритас звучен и горяч. С каждым словом щеки Ардженты пылают все больше от рвения и экзальтации. За этим голосом хочется прорываться сквозь заслоны врагов и минные поля, разя всех, кто посягает на Его славу. Когда гимн заканчивается, вы распалены, словно все это время сражались с Арджентой плечом к плечу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. With every word, her cheeks redden from the zealous exultation. Her voice calls to you, compelling you to follow it through enemy hosts and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is over, you feel a heat coursing through your body as if you have been fighting shoulder to shoulder with Argenta this whole time.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}D'une voix claire et passionnée, la Sœur de Bataille se met à chanter avec une allégresse mêlée de ferveur. Ses paroles vous interpellent, vous encouragent à la suivre à travers les hordes d'ennemis et les champs de mines en massacrant tous ceux qui oseraient s'opposer à la gloire de l'Empereur. Une fois le chant terminé, vous sentez une volonté ardente brûler en vous, comme si vous veniez de combattre aux côtés d'Argenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'une voix claire et passionnée, la Sœur de Bataille se met à chanter avec une allégresse mêlée de ferveur. Ses paroles vous interpellent, vous encouragent à la suivre à travers les hordes d'ennemis et les champs de mines en massacrant tous ceux qui oseraient s'opposer à la gloire de l'Empereur. Une fois le chant terminé, vous sentez une volonté ardente brûler en vous, comme si vous veniez de combattre aux côtés d'Argenta.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de la hermana es clara y apasionada. Su rostro brilla con un júbilo ferviente. Sus palabras te llaman, empujándote a seguirla a través de hordas enemigas y campos de minas, aplastando a todos cuantos osen oponerse a Su gloria. Para cuando concluye el himno, te sientes llen{mf|o|a} de un propósito grandioso, como si Argenta y tú hubierais estado luchando codo con codo todo este tiempo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}

Sus palabras te llaman, empujándote a seguirla a través de hordas enemigas y campos de minas, aplastando a todos cuantos osen oponerse a Su gloria. Para cuando concluye el himno, te sientes llen{mf|o|a} de un propósito grandioso, como si Argenta y tú hubierais estado luchando codo con codo todo este tiempo.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的声音无比清澈，充满激情。她的脸上洋溢着狂热的喜悦，她的歌声召唤着你，迫使你追随着她，冲破成千上万的敌人组成的防线，穿过满是地雷的战场，消灭一切胆敢反对帝皇荣耀的敌人。当颂歌唱完之后，你感觉心里充满了光荣的目标，仿佛你与阿洁塔一直都在并肩作战一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的声音无比清澈，充满激情。她的脸上洋溢着狂热的喜悦，她的歌声召唤着你，迫使你追随着她，冲破成千上万的敌人组成的防线，穿过满是地雷的战场，消灭一切胆敢反对帝皇荣耀的敌人。当颂歌唱完之后，你感觉心里充满了光荣的目标，仿佛你与阿洁塔一直都在并肩作战一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}シスターの声はハッキリしていて、情熱的だ。彼女の顔は熱狂的に輝いている。彼女の言葉があなたに呼びかけ、敵の大群や地雷原を越えて彼女に従い、主の栄光に逆らう者を打ちのめすよう、あなたを駆り立てた。讃美歌が終わるころには、まるでアルジェンタとずっと肩を並べて戦ってきたかのように、輝かしい目的に燃えているのを感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}シスターの声はハッキリしていて、情熱的だ。彼女の顔は熱狂的に輝いている。彼女の言葉があなたに呼びかけ、敵の大群や地雷原を越えて彼女に従い、主の栄光に逆らう者を打ちのめすよう、あなたを駆り立てた。讃美歌が終わるころには、まるでアルジェンタとずっと肩を並べて戦ってきたかのように、輝かしい目的に燃えているのを感じる。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme der Schwester ist klar und leidenschaftlich. Ihr Gesicht leuchtet vor inniger Entrückung. Ihre Worte rufen nach dir, gebieten dir, ihr durch feindliche Horden und über Minenfelder zu folgen, jeden niederzustrecken, der sich gegen den Glanz des Imperators stellt. Als die Hymne endet, hast du das Gefühl, vor glorreicher Bestimmung zu brennen, als hätten Argenta und du die ganze Zeit über Seite an Seite gekämpft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rahibenin sesi net ve tutkulu. Yüzü dindar bir mutlulukla parlıyor. Sözcükleri sana dokunuyor; düşman güruhları ve mayın tarlaları boyunca rahibeyi takip etmeye, O'nun şanına karşı duran kim olursa olsun bertaraf etmeye teşvik ediyor. İlahi sonlandığında muazzam bir amaç hissiyle dolup taşıyorsun. Sanki sen ve Argenta, bütün bu süreç boyunca yan yana savaşmışsınız.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sister's voice is clear and passionate. Her face glows with zealous exultation. Her words call to you, compelling you to follow her through enemy hordes and across minefields, smiting down any who would oppose His glory. By the time the hymn is finished, you feel alight with glorious purpose, as though you and Argenta have been fighting side by side this whole time.{/n}
